titles.title: Community-Based Mental Health Infrastructure Improvements Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the estate of a decedent to use the capital loss carryover of the decedent as a deduction against estate tax.
Community-Based Mental Health Infrastructure Improvements Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction from the gross estate of a decedent for capital losses which the decedent was eligibile to carry over to subsequent taxable years at the time of the decedent's death.
